alert.note: Alert for Butler; Cowley (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 07 at 2:16PM CDT until May 08 at 3:04PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kansas... Walnut River at Winfield affecting Butler and Cowley Counties. For the Walnut River...including Winfield...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Walnut River at Winfield. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, A large portion of the fairgrounds flood along with rural roads about 3 miles northwest of Winfield that are near the river. Then one mile west of the city of Rock, expect 30th Road to be closed due to high water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 21.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tonight and continue falling to 5.5 feet early Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Walnut River Winfield 18.0 21.6 Sat 2 pm CDT 13.9 8.3 6.2 &&
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
